00048 
00049 // ===========================================================================
00050 // method definitions
00051 // ===========================================================================
00052 bool
00053 TraCIServerAPI_Lane::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00054                                 tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00055     std::string warning = "";   // additional description for response
00056     // variable
00057     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00058     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00059     // check variable
00060     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != LANE_LINK_NUMBER && variable != LANE_EDGE_ID && variable != VAR_LENGTH
00061             && variable != VAR_MAXSPEED && variable != LANE_LINKS && variable != VAR_SHAPE
00062             && variable != VAR_CO2EMISSION && variable != VAR_COEMISSION && variable != VAR_HCEMISSION && variable != VAR_PMXEMISSION
00063             && variable != VAR_NOXEMISSION && variable != VAR_FUELCONSUMPTION && variable != VAR_NOISEEMISSION
00064             && variable != LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER
00065             && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST && variable != LAST_STEP_OCCUPANCY && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_HALTING_NUMBER
00066             && variable != LAST_STEP_LENGTH && variable != VAR_CURRENT_TRAVELTIME
00067             && variable != LANE_ALLOWED && variable != LANE_DISALLOWED && variable != VAR_WIDTH && variable != ID_COUNT) {
00068         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get Lane Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00069         return false;
00070     }
00071     // begin response building
00072     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00073     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00074     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_LANE_VARIABLE);
00075     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00076     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00077     if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00078         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00079         MSLane::insertIDs(ids);
00080         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00081         tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00082     } else if (variable == ID_COUNT) {
00083         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00084         MSLane::insertIDs(ids);
00085         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00086         tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00087     } else {
00088         MSLane* lane = MSLane::dictionary(id);
00089         if (lane == 0) {
00090             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Lane '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00091             return false;
00092         }
00093         switch (variable) {
00094             case LANE_LINK_NUMBER:
00095                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_UBYTE);
00096                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte((int) lane->getLinkCont().size());
00097                 break;
00098             case LANE_EDGE_ID:
00099                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00100                 tempMsg.writeString(lane->getEdge().getID());
00101                 break;
00102             case VAR_LENGTH:
00103                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00104                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getLength());
00105                 break;
00106             case VAR_MAXSPEED:
00107                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00108                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getMaxSpeed());
00109                 break;
00110             case LANE_LINKS: {
00111                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_COMPOUND);
00112                 tcpip::Storage tempContent;
00113                 unsigned int cnt = 0;
00114                 tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00115                 const MSLinkCont& links = lane->getLinkCont();
00116                 tempContent.writeInt((int) links.size());
00117                 ++cnt;
00118                 for (MSLinkCont::const_iterator i = links.begin(); i != links.end(); ++i) {
00119                     MSLink* link = (*i);
00120                     // approached non-internal lane (if any)
00121                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00122                     tempContent.writeString(link->getLane() != 0 ? link->getLane()->getID() : "");
00123                     ++cnt;
00124                     // approached "via", internal lane (if any)
00125                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00126 #ifdef HAVE_INTERNAL_LANES
00127                     tempContent.writeString(link->getViaLane() != 0 ? link->getViaLane()->getID() : "");
00128 #else
00129                     tempContent.writeString("");
00130 #endif
00131                     ++cnt;
00132                     // priority
00133                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_UBYTE);
00134                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(link->havePriority() ? 1 : 0);
00135                     ++cnt;
00136                     // opened
00137                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_UBYTE);
00138                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(link->opened(MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep(), MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep(), 0.) ? 1 : 0);
00139                     ++cnt;
00140                     // approaching foe
00141                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_UBYTE);
00142                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(link->hasApproachingFoe(MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep(), MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep()) ? 1 : 0);
00143                     ++cnt;
00144                     // state (not implemented, yet)
00145                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00146                     tempContent.writeString("");
00147                     ++cnt;
00148                     // direction (not implemented, yet)
00149                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00150                     tempContent.writeString("");
00151                     ++cnt;
00152                     // length
00153                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00154                     tempContent.writeDouble(link->getLength());
00155                     ++cnt;
00156                 }
00157                 tempMsg.writeInt((int) cnt);
00158                 tempMsg.writeStorage(tempContent);
00159             }
00160             break;
00161             case LANE_ALLOWED: {
00162                 const SUMOVehicleClasses& allowed = lane->getAllowedClasses();
00163                 std::vector<std::string> allowedS;
00164                 for (SUMOVehicleClasses::const_iterator i = allowed.begin(); i != allowed.end(); ++i) {
00165                     allowedS.push_back(toString(*i));
00166                 }
00167                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00168                 tempMsg.writeStringList(allowedS);
00169             }
00170             case LANE_DISALLOWED: {
00171                 const SUMOVehicleClasses& disallowed = lane->getNotAllowedClasses();
00172                 std::vector<std::string> disallowedS;
00173                 for (SUMOVehicleClasses::const_iterator i = disallowed.begin(); i != disallowed.end(); ++i) {
00174                     disallowedS.push_back(toString(*i));
00175                 }
00176                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00177                 tempMsg.writeStringList(disallowedS);
00178             }
00179             break;
00180             case VAR_SHAPE:
00181                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_POLYGON);
00182                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte((int)MIN2(static_cast<size_t>(255), lane->getShape().size()));
00183                 for (unsigned int iPoint = 0; iPoint < MIN2(static_cast<size_t>(255), lane->getShape().size()); ++iPoint) {
00184                     tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getShape()[iPoint].x());
00185                     tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getShape()[iPoint].y());
00186                 }
00187                 break;
00188             case VAR_CO2EMISSION:
00189                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00190                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_CO2Emissions());
00191                 break;
00192             case VAR_COEMISSION:
00193                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00194                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_COEmissions());
00195                 break;
00196             case VAR_HCEMISSION:
00197                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00198                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_HCEmissions());
00199                 break;
00200             case VAR_PMXEMISSION:
00201                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00202                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_PMxEmissions());
00203                 break;
00204             case VAR_NOXEMISSION:
00205                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00206                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_NOxEmissions());
00207                 break;
00208             case VAR_FUELCONSUMPTION:
00209                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00210                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHBEFA_FuelConsumption());
00211                 break;
00212             case VAR_NOISEEMISSION:
00213                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00214                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getHarmonoise_NoiseEmissions());
00215                 break;
00216             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER:
00217                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00218                 tempMsg.writeInt((int) lane->getVehicleNumber());
00219                 break;
00220             case LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED:
00221                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00222                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getMeanSpeed());
00223                 break;
00224             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST: {
00225                 std::vector<std::string> vehIDs;
00226                 const std::deque<MSVehicle*> &vehs = lane->getVehiclesSecure();
00227                 for (std::deque<MSVehicle*>::const_iterator j = vehs.begin(); j != vehs.end(); ++j) {
00228                     vehIDs.push_back((*j)->getID());
00229                 }
00230                 lane->releaseVehicles();
00231                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00232                 tempMsg.writeStringList(vehIDs);
00233             }
00234             break;
00235             case LAST_STEP_OCCUPANCY:
00236                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00237                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getOccupancy());
00238                 break;
00239             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_HALTING_NUMBER: {
00240                 int halting = 0;
00241                 const std::deque<MSVehicle*> &vehs = lane->getVehiclesSecure();
00242                 for (std::deque<MSVehicle*>::const_iterator j = vehs.begin(); j != vehs.end(); ++j) {
00243                     if ((*j)->getSpeed() < 0.1) {
00244                         ++halting;
00245                     }
00246                 }
00247                 lane->releaseVehicles();
00248                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00249                 tempMsg.writeInt(halting);
00250             }
00251             break;
00252             case LAST_STEP_LENGTH: {
00253                 SUMOReal lengthSum = 0;
00254                 const std::deque<MSVehicle*> &vehs = lane->getVehiclesSecure();
00255                 for (std::deque<MSVehicle*>::const_iterator j = vehs.begin(); j != vehs.end(); ++j) {
00256                     lengthSum += (*j)->getVehicleType().getLengthWithGap();
00257                 }
00258                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00259                 if (vehs.size() == 0) {
00260                     tempMsg.writeDouble(0);
00261                 } else {
00262                     tempMsg.writeDouble(lengthSum / (SUMOReal) vehs.size());
00263                 }
00264                 lane->releaseVehicles();
00265             }
00266             break;
00267             case VAR_CURRENT_TRAVELTIME: {
00268                 SUMOReal meanSpeed = lane->getMeanSpeed();
00269                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00270                 if (meanSpeed != 0) {
00271                     tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getLength() / meanSpeed);
00272                 } else {
00273                     tempMsg.writeDouble(1000000.);
00274                 }
00275             }
00276             break;
00277             case VAR_WIDTH:
00278                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00279                 tempMsg.writeDouble(lane->getWidth());
00280                 break;
00281             default:
00282                 break;
00283         }
00284     }
00285     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00286     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00287     return true;
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 bool
00292 TraCIServerAPI_Lane::processSet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00293                                 tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00294     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00295     // variable
00296     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00297     if (variable != VAR_MAXSPEED && variable != VAR_LENGTH && variable != LANE_ALLOWED && variable != LANE_DISALLOWED) {
00298         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Change Lane State: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00299         return false;
00300     }
00301     // id
00302     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00303     MSLane* l = MSLane::dictionary(id);
00304     if (l == 0) {
00305         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Lane '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00306         return false;
00307     }
00308     // process
00309     int valueDataType = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00310     switch (variable) {
00311         case VAR_MAXSPEED: {
00312             // speed
00313             if (valueDataType != TYPE_DOUBLE) {
00314                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The speed must be given as a double.", outputStorage);
00315                 return false;
00316             }
00317             SUMOReal val = inputStorage.readDouble();
00318             l->setMaxSpeed(val);
00319         }
00320         break;
00321         case VAR_LENGTH: {
00322             // speed
00323             if (valueDataType != TYPE_DOUBLE) {
00324                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The length must be given as a double.", outputStorage);
00325                 return false;
00326             }
00327             SUMOReal val = inputStorage.readDouble();
00328             l->setLength(val);
00329         }
00330         break;
00331         case LANE_ALLOWED: {
00332             if (valueDataType != TYPE_STRINGLIST) {
00333                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Allowed classes must be given as a list of strings.", outputStorage);
00334                 return false;
00335             }
00336             SUMOVehicleClasses allowed;
00337             parseVehicleClasses(inputStorage.readStringList(), allowed);
00338             l->setAllowedClasses(allowed);
00339             l->getEdge().rebuildAllowedLanes();
00340         }
00341         break;
00342         case LANE_DISALLOWED: {
00343             if (valueDataType != TYPE_STRINGLIST) {
00344                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Not allowed classes must be given as a list of strings.", outputStorage);
00345                 return false;
00346             }
00347             SUMOVehicleClasses disallowed;
00348             parseVehicleClasses(inputStorage.readStringList(), disallowed);
00349             l->setNotAllowedClasses(disallowed);
00350             l->getEdge().rebuildAllowedLanes();
00351         }
00352         break;
00353         default:
00354             break;
00355     }
00356     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_LANE_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00357     return true;
00358 }
